languages.text: {n}Скорбно прошипев респиратором, техножрец мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Ритуал эксплуатации был многократно богохульно нарушен. Реквестирую поиск и наказание грешного аколита, которому доверили заботу о духе сей машины".

traits.locale_text: {n}Скорбно прошипев респиратором, техножрец мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Ритуал эксплуатации был многократно богохульно нарушен. Реквестирую поиск и наказание грешного аколита, которому доверили заботу о духе сей машины".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."
languages.original_text: {n}Скорбно прошипев респиратором, техножрец мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Ритуал эксплуатации был многократно богохульно нарушен. Реквестирую поиск и наказание грешного аколита, которому доверили заботу о духе сей машины".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the search and punishment of the sinful acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

{n}Pascal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the search and punishment of the sinful acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

{n}Pascal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the sinful acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

{n}Pascal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the sinful acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

{n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

languages.text: {n}パスカルの呼吸器が悲痛なうなり声を上げ、彼は不機嫌そうに言った。{/n}「任務の儀礼は繰り返し、冒涜的な侵害を受けている。本機の精霊の管理を任された嘆かわしいアコライトの特定と処罰を要請したい」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの呼吸器が悲痛なうなり声を上げ、彼は不機嫌そうに言った。{/n}「任務の儀礼は繰り返し、冒涜的な侵害を受けている。本機の精霊の管理を任された嘆かわしいアコライトの特定と処罰を要請したい」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的呼吸器发出了悲伤的嘶嘶声，随后他严峻地开了口。{/n}“这台沉思者的操作仪式遭到了多次亵渎性侵犯。请求确认并惩罚负责照顾这台机器机魂的可恶侍仆。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的呼吸器发出了悲伤的嘶嘶声，随后他严峻地开了口。{/n}“这台思考器的操作仪式遭到了多次亵渎性侵犯。请求确认并惩罚负责照顾这台机器机魂的可恶侍仆。”

languages.text: {n}El respirador de Pasqal suelta un siseo pesaroso. Proclama sombrío:{/n} «El Rito de Operación ha sido violado de forma repetida y blasfema. Solicito que se identifique y castigue al execrable acólito a quien se haya confiado el cuidado del espíritu de esta máquina».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

traits.locale_text: {n}El respirador de Pasqal suelta un siseo pesaroso. Proclama sombrío:{/n} «El Rito de Operación ha sido violado de forma repetida y blasfema. Solicito que se identifique y castigue al execrable acólito a quien se haya confiado el cuidado del espíritu de esta máquina».

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement affligé s'échappe du respirateur de Pasqal, qui déclare sur un ton sinistre :{/n} « Le Rite d'Opération a été violé de manière blasphématoire à plusieurs reprises. J'exige l'identification et la sanction de l'acolyte déplorable qui était responsable des soins à l'esprit de cette machine. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement affligé s'échappe du respirateur de Pasqal, qui déclare sur un ton sinistre :{/n} « Le Rite d'Opération a été violé de manière blasphématoire à plusieurs reprises. J'exige l'identification et la sanction de l'acolyte déplorable qui était responsable des soins à l'esprit de cette machine. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Atemgerät gibt ein bedrücktes Zischen von sich, dann sagt er grimmig:{/n} "Das Betriebsritual wurde wiederholt und in blasphemischer Weise verletzt. Ich fordere die Identifikation und Bestrafung des schändlichen Akolythen, der mit der Betreuung des Geists dieser Maschine betraut war."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Atemgerät gibt ein bedrücktes Zischen von sich, dann sagt er grimmig:{/n} "Das Betriebsritual wurde wiederholt und in blasphemischer Weise verletzt. Ich fordere die Identifikation und Bestrafung des schändlichen Akolythen, der mit der Betreuung des Geists dieser Maschine betraut war."

languages.text: {n}Solunum maskesinden üzüntülü bir tıslama gelen Pasqal, hoşnutsuzca konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Faaliyet Ayini tekrar tekrar ve kâfirce ihlal edilmiş. Bu makinenin ruhuyla ilgilenmekle görevlendirilen acınası havarinin tanımlanıp cezalandırılmasını talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator lets out a mournful hiss before he says grimly,{/n} "The Rite of Operation has been repeatedly and blasphemously violated. Requesting the identification and punishment of the deplorable acolyte entrusted with caring for the spirit of this machine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solunum maskesinden üzüntülü bir tıslama gelen Pasqal hoşnutsuz bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Faaliyet Ayini tekrar tekrar ve kâfirce bir şekilde ihlal edilmiş. Bu makinenin ruhuyla ilgilenmekle görevlendirilen acınası havarinin tanımlanmasını ve cezalandırılmasını talep ediyorum."
